# zeus_assign (Data Source)

Lookup assign info by ID

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "zeus_assign" "example" {
  id = "assign-id"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Assign ID

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `data` (Map of String)
- `key` (String)
- `leases` (Map of Object) with the following nested attributes:
  - `address` (String)
  - `gateway` (String)
  - `lease_id` (String)
  - `vlan` (Number)
- `type` (String)
